messages.message: how is `view-home-page` both blocking and non-blocking in this CI run (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/62700#issuecomment-2359323416)? :confused_dog:

It's based on individual tests in the suite:
`Getting started: on fresh load, you can create a chat` failed and it's blocking
`Shows Projects and Chats sections that track most recently accessed build projects and conversations` failed and it's nonblocking
ohhh that makes sense, i didn’t realize we handled that!
i think tests that create Converse projects are failing - see latest run (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C029ZG026GZ/p1726688342746509) on aihub-sandbox

Hm, i only see `Shows Projects and Chats sections that track most recently accessed build projects and conversations` failing in the latest sandbox run. but I do see multiple PRs failed with `Getting started: on fresh load, you can create a chat`
https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/14019/overview/6c6f4858-f1e7-41db-bbba-e3b842dded51?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1
https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/14016/overview/79775d0d-c6dd-4676-ada9-5f2bb0d6fd34?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1
https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/14010/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1

also, i can’t reproduce the issue on aihub-sandbox or crafting-cyp

when i rename a Converse project, i do see a `GET /api/v2/aihub/converse/conversations?query_option=workspace&workspace=my-repo` after the `PUT /api/v2/aihub/converse/conversations/*` request
i think the problem is that this specific user has way too many Converse projects (304 on crafting-cyp)
i’m not sure where all of these Converse projects are coming from though
i’m going to try to delete all of these projects on crafting-cyp for <mailto:support-testing.1@instabase.com|support-testing.1@instabase.com>

i think the “New Conversation” projects came from Cypress runs where a new Converse project failed to be renamed to the desired name

(also wow that was very fast for deleting >300 projects on crafting-cyp, i was afraid i was going to cause api-server to crash or something lol)
Yea, in my PR, the test actually passed!
yep, i think the test should pass after including the cleanup for “New Conversation”! i’ll create a PR to clean up “New Conversation” projects and remove the `NON_BLOCKING` tag
Thank you!! I'll close my PR then
kudos to @Jessica for creating the handy util for deleting Converse projects if they exist (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57115)!
here’s the PR to remove the `NON_BLOCKING` tag! https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/62737
